profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Photocopy of typed transcription of José Rafael Rodriguez Gallardo's report on conditions in Sonora and Sinaloa after his period there as acting governor. Includes summary notes in Spanish alongside the text.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Informe de Sinoloa y Sonora (MS 218). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Judge of the high court; became the acting governor of Sonora and Sinaloa from 1748-1749.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photocopy of typed transcription of José Rafael Rodriguez Gallardo's report on conditions in Sonora and Sinaloa after his period there as acting governor. Includes summary notes in Spanish alongside the text.

relatedmaterial.p: In part, photocopies from the Archivo General de la Nación, Ramo de Provincias Internas, Mexico City, and the Bancroft Library, Berkeley.
